Package CZ2002

Class Printer

java.lang.Object
CZ2002.Printer
public class Printer extends Object
the Printer class is responsible for printing out invoices,orders and sale revenue
Since:
2021-11-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hannah V,Shi Yuan,cheryl

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Printer​(OrderDatabase orderDatabase, InvoiceManager invoiceManager)
    this is the constructor for the Printer using the order database and invoice manager

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    printInvoice​(int orderId)
    prints the final receipt of the customer with all the ordered AlaCarte Items and Promotional Sets and its quantities and the final price the customer has to pay, taking into account membership discount and gst
    void
    printOrder​(Order order)
    prints the current AlaCarte items and Promotional Sets and its respective quantities that the customer of that order has ordered
    void
    printSaleRevenue()
    prints the saleRevenue of the particular day that the staff requests for prints out the individual alaCarte items and promotional items and its respective quantity for the day and also prints out the total amount of revenue the restaurant has accumulated for the day

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Printer

      public Printer​(OrderDatabase orderDatabase, InvoiceManager invoiceManager)
      this is the constructor for the Printer using the order database and invoice manager
      Parameters:
      orderDatabase - database of all the orders
      invoiceManager - manager of all the invoices

  • Method Details

    • printInvoice

      public void printInvoice​(int orderId)
      prints the final receipt of the customer with all the ordered AlaCarte Items and Promotional Sets and its quantities and the final price the customer has to pay, taking into account membership discount and gst
      Parameters:
      orderId - the id of the order that you wish to print the invoice of

    • printOrder

      public void printOrder​(Order order)
      prints the current AlaCarte items and Promotional Sets and its respective quantities that the customer of that order has ordered
      Parameters:
      order - the order object that you wish to print the items of

    • printSaleRevenue

      public void printSaleRevenue()
      prints the saleRevenue of the particular day that the staff requests for prints out the individual alaCarte items and promotional items and its respective quantity for the day and also prints out the total amount of revenue the restaurant has accumulated for the day
